alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 25 at 2:18PM PST until November 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Snohomish and King Counties, including Stevens Pass and Snoqualmie Pass and Cascade mountains of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area and Paradise on Mount Rainier. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
